name: TheRoqosHelper
0:
”Alexa, launch The Roqos Helper”
”Alexa, open The Roqos Helper”
”Start over”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the roqos helper
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ask this skill questions about the Roqos unit and its services and it will do its best to provide you with useful answers. For instance, you can ask, "What do the white lights mean?" or "Tell me about parental controls," "Tell me about Open VPN," etc. If you are an owner of a Roqos, this skill will help you get quick answers to some basic questions.

You can find out more about Roqos here: https://www.roqos.com

This skill was built and is being hosted by Witlingo. To get your very own Alexa cast, send an email to contact@witlingo.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
